Driving Force.name: Driving Force
Driving Force.flavor: Your enemy falls back under your ferocious attack, but if it thinks it can escape your wrath, it is mistaken.
Driving Force.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares. If the target makes an attack that doesn’t include you before the start of your next turn, you can make a charge attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.

Crusader's Vengeance.name: Crusader's Vengeance
Crusader's Vengeance.flavor: Your hate guides your attack and delivers a punishing strike that reverberates for the final moments the enemy has left to live.
Crusader's Vengeance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when the target makes an attack that does not include you, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Crusader's Stance.name: Crusader's Stance
Crusader's Stance.flavor: As your enemies attack, your anger only grows, filling you with righteous indignation that you can use to punish them for their transgressions.
Crusader's Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, when an ally you can see takes damage from an enemy’s attack, you gain a +1 bonus to your next attack roll and damage roll before the end of your next turn. This bonus is cumulative, to a maximum of +5.
